Name: war1:various fighters
About the game: Various fighters is is a strategy game,you need to immediately choose different characteristics of the fighters to fight,there are 16 kinds of fighters in the game,the right time to choose the right fighter is the key to winning.there are 90 levels in the game,and if you upgrade all the fighters to 5,a new game mode will be opened.there are 16 achievements in the game. how to playï¼š Before the game start,you need to choose three fighters to fight,After the game started,the fighters will spawn and fight automatically,You can adjust the order of the fighters in real time according to the situation. fighters information: 1.archer 2.bodyguard 3.Giant 4.crossbowman 5.female warrior(skill:Darts) 6.hammerman(skill:thump) 7.sumo(skill:rolling) 8.knight(skill:bounce) 9.slayer(skill:crazy) 10.mage(skill:magic ball) 11.Gladiator(skill:bloodthirsty) 12.ninja 13.sorceress(skill:imprison) 14.spearman 15.swordsman(skill:Double damage) 16.master
